title: Night at the Museum 3 2014 Retail Pal DVD5 Multi Subs TBS
description:
Night at the Museum 3 2014 Retail Pal DVD5 Multi Subs TBS
Secret of the Tomb 

 <a href="
http://imagizer.imageshack.com/img540/3126/jEqZj7.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imagizer.imageshack.com/img540/3126/jEqZj7.jpg</a>

Verenigde Staten / Verenigd Koninkrijk
Avontuur / Komedie
98 minuten

geregisseerd door Shawn Levy
met Ben Stiller, Robin Williams en Ben Kingsley


Larey Daley (Stiller) weet dat een Egyptisch tablet uit de tijd van de farao's
het geheim is achter de tot leven komende museumstukken in het "Museum 
of Natural History".Maar wanneer dit magisch tablet tekenen van corrosie 
begint te vertonen,reist Larry met onder andere Farao Ahkmenrah, Teddy 
Roosevelt en Attila de Hun afnaar het "British Museum" in Londen om 
het te redden van zijn ondergang.
 <a href="
http://imagizer.imageshack.com/img631/8660/D0gq7e.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imagizer.imageshack.com/img631/8660/D0gq7e.jpg</a>

At the Museum of Natural History, there's new exhibit being unveiled. Larry 
Daley who manages the night exhibit because the exhibits come to life because 
of the Tablet of Ahkmenrah, is in charge of the presentation. But when the exhibits 
go wild, Larry finds himself in trouble. He learns that the Tablet is corroding 
so he does some research and learns that Cecil, the former museum guard was 
at the site when the Tablet was discovered. He tells Larry that they were warned 
that if they remove it could mean the end. Larry realizes it means the end of magic. 
He talks to Ahkmenrah who says that he doesn't know anything. Only his father 
the Pharoah knows the Tablet's secrets. He learns that the Pharoah was sent 
to the London museum. So he convinces, Dr. McPhee the museum curator to
 help send him to London. He goes and takes Ahkmenrah with him but some 
of the others like Teddy Roosevelt, Attila, Octavius, and Jedediah come with him. 



Vanaf 10 juni te koop op dvd en blu-ray
